New Records: San Diego Padres tied an MLB playoff record with 6 home runs in a game
Fernando Tatis Jr. tied the postseason lead with 3 home runs
Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a solo home run in the first inning
David Peralta hit a two-run home run in the second inning
Jackson Merrill hit a two-run home run in the eighth inning
Kyle Higashioka hit a solo home run in the ninth inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jurickson Profar robbed a home run from Mookie Betts in the first inning
Fans threw items onto the field during the game, causing a delay
Others: Yu Darvish pitched 7 one-run innings with 3 strikeouts
Jack Flaherty scored in the sixth after surrendering 4 runs on 5 hits and a walk
